attributes.action: Save oriental City at Collindale, West London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Oriental City is a mixture of cultures and business from around the the world and particularly Asia. The Centre is a wonderful way for East to meet West and it serves as a meeting place for food and enjoyment for many thousands of visitors every week of the year.

Please save the centre from re-development and help us keep something that is widly seen as a 'Visit to the Orient' - without taking the plane.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
